For Lottery A, with 3000 Euros at 25% probability and 0 Euros at 75%, the expected value is \(3000 \times 0.25 + 0 \times 0.75 = 750\) Euros. Comparing the variances, Lottery B has a larger variance (\(4,608,000\)) than Lottery A (\(1,687,500\)). Thus, the decision reason prefers Lottery B.
